document.full_text: forces loyal to libyan leader muammar gaddafi are staging a "massacre" in the besieged city of misrata, evacuees said on monday, as turkey said it was trying to broker a ceasefire to halt the bloodshed.
document.title: libya wounded describe siege hell, turkey seeks peace
lines_and_colors: forces loyal to libyan leader muammar gaddafi are staging a "massacre" in the besieged city of misrata, evacuees said on monday, as turkey said it was trying to broker a ceasefire to halt the bloodshed.
